column2: Primevalists were among the first to uncover the old dig sites of ancient dinosaurs and view them as divine, claiming that the titanic Saurians were demigods who lived in the holy land of Pangaea before being wiped out by Chicxulub the Demon Meteor. To survive the harsh world after The Event, and to keep in competition with neighbors, mankind must emulate the Saurians and claim the world through Survival of the Fittest.

Primevalists were among the first to uncover the old dig sites of ancient dinosaurs and view them as divine, claiming that the titanic Saurians were demigods who lived in the holy land of Pangaea before being wiped out by Chicxulub the Demon Meteor. To survive the harsh world after The Event, and to keep in competition with neighbors, mankind must emulate the Saurians and claim the world through Survival of the Fittest. The Paleothists have returned to their organized scientific roots, leading to reform for the Primevalist faith.
Evolution is respected by the clergy and especially the head of your Religion. It can be spent to petition the head of your Religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
Primevalists can embody the ways of particular dinosaurs in their everyday life, either as the vicious Carnivore or the enduring Herbivore.

I have the chance to learn more from the titans of old by embracing their ways of life, so that I may better survive in this harsh world. The path of the vicious Carnivore-Hunter will find dominance on the hunt and in battle, while the path of the hardy Herbivore-Gatherer finds harmony and endurance for their realm and the natural world around them.

[Root.GetTitledName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the adherents of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nWe must save the people from [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] and bring them back to a primordial era!

[Root.GetTitledName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the barbaric heathens!\n\nThese uneducated followers of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] must be faced with prehistoric force!

[Root.GetTitledName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the [New.Religion.GetName] infidels in [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the deniers of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe profaners of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will pay for their lies!

In ancient times, the world was united into a single divine landmass upon which the Saurians ruled, before the demon meteor Chicxulub shattered that land. I cannot pull the continents back together, but I have conquered far enough to enact a new divine land for the Primevalists.

Although the Primevalists will never be able to pull the continents back together, they are finally able to enjoy a paradise on Earth as a divine land bearing the name of that long-lost supercontinent has been established. Stretching across the West Coast and the Rockies, Pangaea's might will dominate the region for untold millennia, in a way unmatched since the Saurians themselves walked the Earth.
Through establishing a new empire, this ruler restored the spirit of the ancient supercontinent and matches any Saurian in might.
